title: This might be an unique lag-spike problem.

replies.body:
Hey, thanks for reaching out to us.  I'm definitely interested in your thread and getting you back in-game without issue.  Based on what you're reporting, it sounds like your network is degrading over time and resulting in packet loss.  Running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on these games can help affirm these issues.  If you haven't already, 

I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up.  Test it out in a custom game, and let me know if if you run into any issues.
Greetings! I`ve run a log reader.I send you the link ?
Hey there, you can just toss me the score and info the log provided.  Were the steps in the connection guide able to help?

Hello! :) I only managed to do a Full Repair.It seems it might helped a bit.Its not lagging so often now.The score before and after the repair is 99/100.I dont know how can I provide you the log information,as I cant attach any files here.
